title: Final velocity of disk after collision

content.prompt: A disc of mass m slides with negligible friction along a flat surface with a velocity v. The disc strikes a wall head-on and bounces back in the opposite direction with a kinetic energy one-fourth of its initial kinetic energy. What is the final velocity of the disc?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
